code: import React from'react';import{Alert,AlertTitle,Box,Button,Collapse,List,ListItem,ListItemText}from'@mui/material';import{Error as ErrorIcon,Refresh as RefreshIcon}from'@mui/icons-material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ErrorMessage=_ref=>{let{message,errors=[],severity='error',title,onRetry,retryText='Reintentar',showDetails=false,onClose}=_ref;const[detailsOpen,setDetailsOpen]=React.useState(showDetails&&errors.length>0);const handleToggleDetails=()=>{setDetailsOpen(!detailsOpen);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{width:'100%',mb:2},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Alert,{severity:severity,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorIcon,{}),onClose:onClose,action:onRetry&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"inherit",size:"small",onClick:onRetry,startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RefreshIcon,{}),children:retryText}),children:[title&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlertTitle,{children:title}),message,errors.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mt:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"small",onClick:handleToggleDetails,sx:{p:0,minWidth:'auto',textTransform:'none'},children:detailsOpen?'Ocultar detalles':'Ver detalles'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Collapse,{in:detailsOpen,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{dense:true,sx:{mt:1},children:errors.map((error,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItem,{sx:{py:0.5,px:0},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:`• ${error}`,slotProps:{primary:{variant:'body2',color:'text.secondary'}}})},index))})})]})]})});};export default ErrorMessage;
